code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:52 yo F lighting technician presents with 7 weeks history of mild difficulty in school, mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. denies any smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 166 cm, Weight 92.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

s:a 53 year old white female says she is having symptoms of Neurological 3-5 x day, mostly during the day. denies any smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 166 cm, Weight 92.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Numbness p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 0.6 mg daily, and ordered Glucose, Serum.

s:a 53 yo white F lighting technician presents with mild difficulty with reading and writing, mild difficulty seeing similarities and differences in letters and words and mild difficulty in school. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 167 cm, Weight 93.6 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Dyslexia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed METHYLIN - 2.5 mg 2 x daily (max. 54 mg/day), and ordered Hearing Test.

content2.Unmatched: denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes
